title: add elements from oldList to newList

content.prompt:
Consider the following code segment.

ArrayList<Integer> oldList = new ArrayList();

oldList.add(100);

oldList.add(200);

oldList.add(300);

oldList.add(400);

ArrayList<Integer> newList = new ArrayList();

newList.add(oldList.remove(1));

newList.add(oldList.get(2));

System.out.println(newList);

What, if anything, is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

choices.label: Nothing is printed because the code segment does not compile.

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
